text:
Lower Manhattan skyline, is seen from the Brooklyn Bridge, looking
southwest.

June 5, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.

View 2,
The Brooklyn Bridge view northward to show beneath same Knickerbocker Village. The White structure to the right front of the same is the Hearst Publications Building, on South Street. To the extreme right appears a portion the Manhattan Bridge.

September l6, 1935.

View 3,
Brooklyn Bridge; over the roof tops of lower East side of Manhattan, looking north east from Fulton and Gold Streets.

August 1, 1930.
title: Bridges - Brooklyn Bridge - [Lower Manhattan skyline.]

Fulton Street at Albee Square, to Northwest, Brooklyn
